      • partSelectListener

        public void partSelectListener()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        RUNTIME ERROR - Calling FXMLLoader.getController() without calling FXMLLoader.load() threw a NullPointerException. Fixed by calling FXMLLoader.load()

        RUNTIME ERROR - Clicking on an empty row caused an IndexOutOfBoundsException thrown by getSelectedItem(). Implemented a check for an empty selection.

        Detects mouseclicks in the Parts table. If the click was on a valid row, calls setSelectedPart from PartFormController

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - String filename arguement for getResource()

      • partSearchBarListener

        public void partSearchBarListener()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Listens for the enter key in the parts searchbar. partName could potentially be a String of number characters. parts are searched by String first. if the string can be parsed into an int, search for partId as well, and append to the initial results
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • productAddListener

        public void productAddListener()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Event listener for the 'ADD' button in the products table. calls the setMode('a') method from the ProductFormController, pre-renders the form, and opens it in a new window.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - getResource() takes a String filename

      • productModifyListener

        public void productModifyListener()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        RUNTIME ERROR - nullPointerException thrown by not checking selectedProduct for null value. Created a conditional statement to gracefully display a dialog box.

        Event listener for the 'Modify' button in the products table. calls the setMode('m') method from the ProductFormController, pre-renders the form, and opens it in a new window.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - getResource() takes a String filename

      • productDeleteListener

        public void productDeleteListener()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Event listener for the 'Delete' button in the Products table. Checks if a product is selected. If so, the selected product is removed from Inventory, as well as the table
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - potentially thrown by productSelectListener()

      • productSelectListener

        public void productSelectListener()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        RUNTIME ERROR - Clicking on an empty row caused an IndexOutOfBoundsException thrown by getSelectedItem(). Implemented a check for an empty selection.

        Event listener that detects a valid row select when a mouse click is detected in the products table.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - getResource() takes a String filename argument

      • productSearchBarListener

        public void productSearchBarListener()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Listens for the enter key in the products searchbar. productName could potentially be a String of number characters. products are searched by String first. if the string can be parsed into an int, search for productId as well, and append to the initial results

        java.io.IOException
